Class.Name: NSEvent
Class.Description: An object that contains information about an input action, such as a mouse click or a key press.

InstanceMethods.Name: charactersByApplyingModifiers:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the new characters that result if you apply the specified modifier keys to the event.

InstanceMethods.Name: trackSwipeEventWithOptions:dampenAmountThresholdMin:max:usingHandler:
InstanceMethods.Description: Allows tracking and user interface feedback of scroll wheel events.
InstanceMethods.Declaration:
- (void)trackSwipeEventWithOptions:(NSEventSwipeTrackingOptions)options 
          dampenAmountThresholdMin:(CGFloat)minDampenThreshold 
                               max:(CGFloat)maxDampenThreshold 
                      usingHandler:(void (^)(CGFloat gestureAmount, NSEventPhase phase, BOOL isComplete, BOOL *stop))trackingHandler;

InstanceMethods.Name: touchesMatchingPhase:inView:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the touch objects associated with the specified phase.

InstanceMethods.Name: allTouches
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns all touch objects associated with the event.

InstanceMethods.Name: touchesForView:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the touch objects from the event that belong to the specified view.

InstanceMethods.Name: coalescedTouchesForTouch:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns all of the touch objects associated with the specified main touch.

InstanceMethods.Name: locationInNode:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the location of the receiver in the coordinate system of the given node.

InstanceProperties.Name: type
InstanceProperties.Description: The event’s type.

InstanceProperties.Name: subtype
InstanceProperties.Description: The event’s subtype.

InstanceProperties.Name: locationInWindow
InstanceProperties.Description: The event location in the base coordinate system of the associated window.

InstanceProperties.Name: timestamp
InstanceProperties.Description: The time when the event occurred in seconds since system startup.

InstanceProperties.Name: window
InstanceProperties.Description: The window object associated with the event.

InstanceProperties.Name: windowNumber
InstanceProperties.Description: The identifier for the window device associated with the event.

InstanceProperties.Name: eventRef
InstanceProperties.Description: An opaque Carbon type associated with this event.

InstanceProperties.Name: CGEvent
InstanceProperties.Description: The Core Graphics event object corresponding to this event.

InstanceProperties.Name: modifierFlags
InstanceProperties.Description: An integer bit field that indicates the pressed modifier keys.

InstanceProperties.Name: characters
InstanceProperties.Description: The characters associated with a key-up or key-down event.

InstanceProperties.Name: charactersIgnoringModifiers
InstanceProperties.Description: The characters generated by a key event as if no modifier key (except for Shift) applies.

InstanceProperties.Name: keyCode
InstanceProperties.Description: The virtual code for the key associated with the event.

InstanceProperties.Name: ARepeat
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the key event is a repeat.

InstanceProperties.Name: buttonNumber
InstanceProperties.Description: The button number for a mouse event.

InstanceProperties.Name: clickCount
InstanceProperties.Description: The number of mouse clicks associated with a mouse-down or mouse-up event.

InstanceProperties.Name: associatedEventsMask
InstanceProperties.Description: The associated events mask of a mouse event.

InstanceProperties.Name: deltaX
InstanceProperties.Description: The x-coordinate change for scroll wheel, mouse-move, mouse-drag, and swipe events.

InstanceProperties.Name: deltaY
InstanceProperties.Description: The y-coordinate change for scroll wheel, mouse-move, mouse-drag, and swipe events.

InstanceProperties.Name: deltaZ
InstanceProperties.Description: The z-coordinate change for a scroll wheel, mouse-move, or mouse-drag event.

InstanceProperties.Name: hasPreciseScrollingDeltas
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether precise scrolling deltas are available.

InstanceProperties.Name: scrollingDeltaX
InstanceProperties.Description: The scroll wheel’s horizontal delta.

InstanceProperties.Name: scrollingDeltaY
InstanceProperties.Description: The scroll wheel’s vertical delta.

InstanceProperties.Name: momentumPhase
InstanceProperties.Description: The momentum phase for a scroll or flick gesture.

InstanceProperties.Name: directionInvertedFromDevice
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the user has changed the device inversion.

InstanceProperties.Name: phase
InstanceProperties.Description: The phase of a gesture event, such as a magnify, scroll, or pressure change.

InstanceProperties.Name: magnification
InstanceProperties.Description: The amount of change to add to a magnification gesture.

InstanceProperties.Name: pressure
InstanceProperties.Description: A normalized value that indicates the degree of pressure applied to an appropriate input device.

InstanceProperties.Name: stage
InstanceProperties.Description: A value that indicates the stage of a pressure gesture event.

InstanceProperties.Name: stageTransition
InstanceProperties.Description: The transition value for the stage of a pressure gesture event.

InstanceProperties.Name: pressureBehavior
InstanceProperties.Description: The behavior and progression for a pressure event.

InstanceProperties.Name: capabilityMask
InstanceProperties.Description: A mask that indicates the capabilities of the tablet device that generated this event.

InstanceProperties.Name: deviceID
InstanceProperties.Description: A special identifier the system matches against tablet-pointer and tablet-proximity events.

InstanceProperties.Name: enteringProximity
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether a pointing device is entering or leaving the proximity of its tablet.

InstanceProperties.Name: pointingDeviceID
InstanceProperties.Description: The index of the pointing device currently in proximity with the tablet.

InstanceProperties.Name: pointingDeviceSerialNumber
InstanceProperties.Description: The vendor-assigned serial number of a pointing device.

InstanceProperties.Name: pointingDeviceType
InstanceProperties.Description: The kind of pointing device associated with this event.

InstanceProperties.Name: systemTabletID
InstanceProperties.Description: The index of the tablet device connected to the system.

InstanceProperties.Name: tabletID
InstanceProperties.Description: The USB model identifier of the tablet device associated with this event.

InstanceProperties.Name: uniqueID
InstanceProperties.Description: The unique identifier of the pointing device that generated this event.

InstanceProperties.Name: vendorID
InstanceProperties.Description: The vendor identifier of the tablet associated with the event.

InstanceProperties.Name: vendorPointingDeviceType
InstanceProperties.Description: A coded bit field whose set bits indicate the type of pointing device (within a vendor selection) associated with the event.

InstanceProperties.Name: absoluteX
InstanceProperties.Description: The absolute x coordinate of a pointing device on its tablet at full tablet resolution.

InstanceProperties.Name: absoluteY
InstanceProperties.Description: The absolute y coordinate of a pointing device on its tablet at full tablet resolution.

InstanceProperties.Name: absoluteZ
InstanceProperties.Description: The absolute z coordinate of pointing device on its tablet at full tablet resolution.

InstanceProperties.Name: buttonMask
InstanceProperties.Description: A bit mask identifying the buttons pressed for a tablet event.

InstanceProperties.Name: rotation
InstanceProperties.Description: The rotation in degrees of the tablet pointing device associated with this event.

InstanceProperties.Name: tangentialPressure
InstanceProperties.Description: The tangential pressure on the device that generated this event.

InstanceProperties.Name: tilt
InstanceProperties.Description: The scaled tilt values of the pointing device that generated this event.

InstanceProperties.Name: vendorDefined
InstanceProperties.Description: An array of three vendor-defined number objects associated with a pointing-type event.

InstanceProperties.Name: eventNumber
InstanceProperties.Description: The counter value of the latest mouse or tracking-rectangle event object.

InstanceProperties.Name: trackingNumber
InstanceProperties.Description: The identifier of a mouse-tracking event.

InstanceProperties.Name: trackingArea
InstanceProperties.Description: The tracking area for the event.

InstanceProperties.Name: userData
InstanceProperties.Description: The data associated with a mouse-tracking event.

InstanceProperties.Name: data1
InstanceProperties.Description: Additional data associated with this event.

InstanceProperties.Name: data2
InstanceProperties.Description: Additional data associated with this event.

InstanceProperties.Name: context
InstanceProperties.Description: The display graphics context for this event.

TypeMethods.Name: keyEventWithType:location:modifierFlags:timestamp:windowNumber:context:characters:charactersIgnoringModifiers:isARepeat:keyCode:
TypeMethods.Description: Creates and returns a new event object that describes a key event.
TypeMethods.Declaration:
+ (NSEvent *)keyEventWithType:(NSEventType)type 
                     location:(NSPoint)location 
                modifierFlags:(NSEventModifierFlags)flags 
                    timestamp:(NSTimeInterval)time 
                 windowNumber:(NSInteger)wNum 
                      context:(NSGraphicsContext *)unusedPassNil 
                   characters:(NSString *)keys 
  charactersIgnoringModifiers:(NSString *)ukeys 
                    isARepeat:(BOOL)flag 
                      keyCode:(unsigned short)code;

TypeMethods.Name: mouseEventWithType:location:modifierFlags:timestamp:windowNumber:context:eventNumber:clickCount:pressure:
TypeMethods.Description: Creates and returns a new event object that describes a mouse-down, -up, -moved, or -dragged event.
TypeMethods.Declaration:
+ (NSEvent *)mouseEventWithType:(NSEventType)type 
                       location:(NSPoint)location 
                  modifierFlags:(NSEventModifierFlags)flags 
                      timestamp:(NSTimeInterval)time 
                   windowNumber:(NSInteger)wNum 
                        context:(NSGraphicsContext *)unusedPassNil 
                    eventNumber:(NSInteger)eNum 
                     clickCount:(NSInteger)cNum 
                       pressure:(float)pressure;

TypeMethods.Name: enterExitEventWithType:location:modifierFlags:timestamp:windowNumber:context:eventNumber:trackingNumber:userData:
TypeMethods.Description: Creates and returns a new event object that describes a tracking-rectangle or cursor-update event.
TypeMethods.Declaration:
+ (NSEvent *)enterExitEventWithType:(NSEventType)type 
                           location:(NSPoint)location 
                      modifierFlags:(NSEventModifierFlags)flags 
                          timestamp:(NSTimeInterval)time 
                       windowNumber:(NSInteger)wNum 
                            context:(NSGraphicsContext *)unusedPassNil 
                        eventNumber:(NSInteger)eNum 
                     trackingNumber:(NSInteger)tNum 
                           userData:(void *)data;

TypeMethods.Name: otherEventWithType:location:modifierFlags:timestamp:windowNumber:context:subtype:data1:data2:
TypeMethods.Description: Creates and returns a new event object that describes a custom event.
TypeMethods.Declaration:
+ (NSEvent *)otherEventWithType:(NSEventType)type 
                       location:(NSPoint)location 
                  modifierFlags:(NSEventModifierFlags)flags 
                      timestamp:(NSTimeInterval)time 
                   windowNumber:(NSInteger)wNum 
                        context:(NSGraphicsContext *)unusedPassNil 
                        subtype:(short)subtype 
                          data1:(NSInteger)d1 
                          data2:(NSInteger)d2;

TypeMethods.Name: eventWithEventRef:
TypeMethods.Description: Creates an event object that is based on a Carbon type of event.

TypeMethods.Name: eventWithCGEvent:
TypeMethods.Description: Creates and returns an event object for a Core Graphics event.

TypeMethods.Name: startPeriodicEventsAfterDelay:withPeriod:
TypeMethods.Description: Begins generating periodic events for the current thread.

TypeMethods.Name: stopPeriodicEvents
TypeMethods.Description: Stops generating periodic events for the current thread and discards any periodic events remaining in the queue.

TypeMethods.Name: addGlobalMonitorForEventsMatchingMask:handler:
TypeMethods.Description: Installs an event monitor that receives copies of events the system posts to other applications.

TypeMethods.Name: addLocalMonitorForEventsMatchingMask:handler:
TypeMethods.Description: Installs an event monitor that receives copies of events the system posts to this app prior to their dispatch.

TypeProperties.Name: keyRepeatDelay
TypeProperties.Description: The number of seconds someone must hold down a key before the first key repeat event occurs.

TypeProperties.Name: keyRepeatInterval
TypeProperties.Description: Returns the length between subsequent key repeat events being posted.

TypeProperties.Name: pressedMouseButtons
TypeProperties.Description: Returns the indices of the currently depressed mouse buttons.

TypeProperties.Name: doubleClickInterval
TypeProperties.Description: The maximum number of seconds in which a second mouse click must occur for an event to be a double-click event.

TypeProperties.Name: mouseLocation
TypeProperties.Description: Reports the current mouse position in screen coordinates.

TypeProperties.Name: swipeTrackingFromScrollEventsEnabled
TypeProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether to track fluid swipe gestures using scroll events.

TypeProperties.Name: mouseCoalescingEnabled
TypeProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the system coalesces mouse movement events.
